game.title: Dragon Defeat
game.objective: Defeat the menacing dragon terrorizing the town
game.description: A menacing dragon has been terrorizing the local town. The townsfolk are in desperate need of a brave hero to slay the beast and bring peace once more.
game.reward: 5000 gold coins and the Dragon Slayer sword

task.description: Speak with the local townsfolk and gather information about the dragon's behavior and possible weaknesses
Travel to the dragon's lair, confront the beast, and slay it to save the town
